mapper.sql: id, device_id, site_name, tel_phone, lng, lat, start_time, end_time
mapper.delete: delete from t_range_device where device_id in ( select id from t_device where community_id=#{0})
delete from t_range_device where device_id in ( select id from t_device where area_id=#{0})
mapper.insert: insert into t_range_device (id, device_id, site_name, tel_phone,lng, lat, start_time, end_time) values (#{id}, #{deviceId}, #{siteName}, #{telPhone}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
